tip: Check for task animations not playing to spot impostors faking tasks.
Downloading a file takes around 6-7 seconds.
Sometimes when playing with another impostor, not making a single kill can bring you to victory.
Be suspicious of players you have not seen the entire game.
Proving your innocence is more important than killing.
When two crew mates are left, trigging a sabotage is a guaranteed victory.
Sometimes, it is necessary to blame other impostors directly to prove your innocence.
